synopsis.text: In the popular MMORPG called "The World", a diverse group of players are brought together by the mysterious hacker Helba for a celebration event in the Net Slums area of the game. Those gathered include characters from the ".hack" game series and anime ".hack//SIGN", some meeting for the first time. Old companions like Tsukasa, Bear, BT, Mimiru, and Subaru relish the chance to reunite alongside the rarely-seen Silver Knight. New bonds are also formed, as iconic characters like Kite, Black Rose, Balmung, and Orca socialize with SIGN regulars. After adventures across various game worlds, the party serves as an epilogue bringing together the extended ".hack" universe. With the threat of viruses now controlled thanks to Kite and the Twilight Bracelet, all can finally relax and enjoy themselves. The excitement builds for long-time friends and new acquaintances alike as they journey together to commemorate their experiences in "The World."
